name: One Man's Trash is Another's Treasure (OMTAT)
desc: A computer recycling and donation project, which managed to process just under 100 computers, and donate 70 of them to local non-proffits

name: Asociacion pro-Reciclaje de Electronicos (ARElec)
desc: A small association, which managed to promote and spread awareness of computer recycling and security to the UPRM Campus population
